website_summaries.verdict: This small but powerful model has no problem handling the most common microwave uses, while the size is perfect for those with limited counter space.
pros: We were surprised by the power of this unit's 900W, considering its size
The push button commands are intuitive and include a convenient 30-second quick touch option
The stainless steel and red color options will match the decor of most kitchens
cons: The slower carousel speed may lead to uneven cooking on occasion

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my house hold
customer_reviews.text: I've only had my microwave about a week it was packed really well I really like it. Looks so pretty. Just a splash of red, not a slap you in the face red It works really good, so much quieter than my old one The only thing that I don't like is the done beeper is really loud and beeps 5 time's. Twice would have been good actually I'd turn it off if I could lol but, it's not that big of a deal I REALLY LIKE my new microwave Thank you Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.author: Nana3

customer_reviews.title: That quality is of utmost importance to me.
customer_reviews.text: Used daily in my kitchen. It is beautiful, blend well with the kitchen interior. We really like the microwave. So elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Young

customer_reviews.title: It's very very red!!!
customer_reviews.text: The microwave works fine. The red stripes are much redder than expected and sparkle. I thought the stripes would be more of a matte finish. I considered returning it but it's the perfect size and works well.
customer_reviews.author: CT Buyer75

customer_reviews.title: great! Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: So far, great! Lots of power. Nice looking. I love that the kitchen timer shows on the readout. Convenient features. Easy to learn. I recommend! Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer Chic

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I am handicappped and this is very easy to use. I m so happy that I bought this product and would definitely recommend this to anyone. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Like different settings
customer_reviews.text: Working well. Like different settings. But am seeing cheaper in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nichols

customer_reviews.title: If you like red, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! Perfect fit for my counter. Easy to use and love all the fixtures/buttons. The only thing I had a problem with was setting the clock.
customer_reviews.author: SmileGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Product very nice , only thing glass in oven keeps getting undone for rotating cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan leisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and size for a microwave. Would recommend to any1.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Clayton

customer_reviews.title: 900 watts is Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had a 700 watt microwave before replacing it with this one for the kids. My other microwave is 1100 watts and they tend to overheat their food. So this 900 watt microwave is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Love the retro look
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our kitchen, so far works very well.
customer_reviews.author: new york city boy

customer_reviews.title: ... how it has the potato button and it's really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend and she loves how it has the potato button and it's really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Pietrantoni

customer_reviews.title: No issues this far
customer_reviews.text: Had for about a year - still works great as the day I bought it... a friend had one and he said he had it for several years which is what sold me...looking to get the same type use...
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and works as well as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a reason to say any thing negative about the microwave so far, it warms food, tea and cleans easily
customer_reviews.author: Uniquelymade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I really like mine, it came today & works great! Shipping time was actually earlier than it was suppose to be & it was well packaged. It looks sharp with the red design on it. Glad I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S.

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these. After a few months, they cut out. Wont heat anything over 1 minute 30 seconds. It just shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than the one I had but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift to an older bachelor He loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Doesn’t even take a minute to make anything hot...only thing is I wish it had more red in the design
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Color was as show very pretty and works good so far only had a week
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H.

customer_reviews.title: It's very good to have when u want to heat up left overs and breakfast food
customer_reviews.text: It's small and convenient Heats up my food properly I like it
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy so far actually just started using it last week
customer_reviews.author: TERI

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Wave
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product.Gave this to my son who did not want stainless steel for Xmas.He loved the red which is more like a metallic sport car red not matte.Easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, pops popcorn, does everything I need, plus not to big but big enough
customer_reviews.author: Maletta Essex

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine, Just not as powerful
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not as powerful as I thought, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoRead Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking; a bit weak power
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking; a bit weak power, but it is what I needed. If you want full power, large micro...buy full size unit
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this item again.
customer_reviews.text: The clock on this microwave no longer works . . . the time cannot be set. It is pretty but has not performed. I would not buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn James

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I DON'T LIKE THIS THING AT ALL. FOR 900 WATTS IT BARELY COOKS AND SQUEAKS. GETTING TIRED OF RETURNING THESE LACKLUSTER PRODUCTS TO AMAZON!!!!!! I ORDER A LOT OF STUFF AND HAVE HAD TO RETURN A BUNCH OF IT
customer_reviews.author: BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Nice Microwave....
customer_reviews.text: I got a great price on this microwave. Its 900 watts which is amazing because 900 watt microwaves don't come cheap. If you have been shopping around you know that microwaves just don't seem to last. I looked at cheaper options but they didn't seem to last longer than a year. I hope this microwave does stand the sands of time. For now it works well it looks great, and seems to be a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Berger

customer_reviews.title: Microwave stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Microwave nice and quiet when it runs. Problem is I’ve only had it since end of last August. Exactly 5 months and it has stopped working. Makes the sound as if it’s working but does not work. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: pleasant color
customer_reviews.text: I like the color combo and the operation ease is very well, one drawback is when setting on counter, microwave tends to pull forward when opening microwave, why H.B. DID NOT DO ANYTHING TO CORRECT THIS PROBLEM, I' ll update when I learn more on appliance
customer_reviews.author: cruzer02

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well For A Few Months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a few months, then after that it started becoming very inconsistent. Where sometimes it would heat up food and other times would barely heat anything up. Other times it would only heat half of the food even though the turn table was working perfectly fine. I did a lot of experiments where I heated up the same type of food in a perfectly round bowl. So yeah a very low quality microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: I really like this microwave - easy to use and program
customer_reviews.text: I really like this microwave - easy to use and program, very quiet, gives even heating, but..........it beeps 5 times when the time is up. Two or three beeps would suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works very well in all respects, has a ton ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in all respects, has a ton of features for a VERY low price. Only downside, it's so light it moves the whole unit when pressing buttons unless you hold it with the other hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does work very well, but, sometimes it doesn't heat frozen food properly
customer_reviews.author: JUNGAH L.

customer_reviews.title: Check the size
customer_reviews.text: I did not believe that 0.2 inches would be a big difference. I had a 1.1 Cu In microwave and bought this to replace a tired and worn out MWO....But that little bit of space is a huge deal. It works great and looks fantastic...but be aware of the loss of capacity. You can still warm a plate, but the prep cooking and stuff I used to do with it are gone unless I wanna do it in shifts.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Son to use in his dorm, works like a champ, no issues what so ever, easy to use, light weight and does the job better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: I still really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Red and Black but was sent the Silver and Black instead. I still really love this product. It works well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective But Loud
customer_reviews.text: This is a really effective microwave; I like it; however, the motor is so loud until it sounds like a generator running every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Seasoned Midget

customer_reviews.title: Love this appliance
customer_reviews.text: This is more powerful than my previous microwave oven and works great. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and easy to use. Great shipping - faster than expected delivery, too.
customer_reviews.author: lindarabbit

customer_reviews.title: MICROWAVE DIED AFTER  9 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: This microwave died after 9 months of use. I did not use it for cooking. I only used it to heat up food. I lost money on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Celia D.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: For the price, excellent microwave. Does the job. I don't use it for cooking, just reheating.
customer_reviews.author: s. Vigen

customer_reviews.title: Nice powerful microwave
customer_reviews.text: Nice powerful microwave. Works great in the break room and cheaper than Walmart! Looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: micro wave
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work. Power just not as powerful as I wanted. My mistake looked more at the style and color. Not watts.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn F.

customer_reviews.title: Our student really love the microwaves
customer_reviews.text: Received on time, no problems. Our student really love the microwaves.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift in my office break room; great product! So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Its okay. Does the job and not bad for the money. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Koo

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars...
customer_reviews.text: Great little microwave. It's already outlasted a more expensive brand I bought previously.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Paternostro

customer_reviews.title: She saw a picture of it at Christmas and will be finally home after 3 months of being in the hospital to see her pretty new micr
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom for Xmas. She saw a picture of it at Christmas and will be finally home after 3 months of being in the hospital to see her pretty new microwave. She is very excited.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Love this black and red micro
customer_reviews.text: Love this black and red micro. So happy a very pleased. Works great,perfect size and very easy ro use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little micro just a bit less power than I've had before, but it's working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque F. Dockery

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Midget!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an employee. She loves it . Great price and works as advertised. She liked the red as well.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Jim

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and it is exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and the glass tray doesn't slip off like ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and the glass tray doesn't slip off like so many other Microwaves I used. Very nice quality, and rich looking. Also you can just press a number up to 9 minutes to cook fast. Or click the "cook" button, then the time, if you cook longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Parks

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 0.9 cu ft 900W Microwave,by Product Hamilton Beach (Red)
product_meta.description: This Hamilton Beach Microwave features 10 microwave power levels and the one-touch cooking features popcorn, potato, reheat, frozen dinner, beverage and pizza settings with Child Safety Lock.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars171 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
